We are gonna use the bottom up approach in order to solve this question. For that we need to traverse backwards.\n\n        for i in range(len(word1)-1,-1,-1):\n            for j in range(len(word2)-1,-1,-1):\n                if word1[i]==word2[j]:\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i+1][j+1]\n                else:\n                    #The three operations that we can do right now is insert,update,delete\n                    #insert#Replace#Delete\n                    dp[i][j]=1+min(dp[i+1][j],dp[i+1][j+1],dp[i][j+1])\n        return dp[0][0]\n\n        return 1","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
